# plotellaneous 🎨📊

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

I put in `plotellaneous` my miscellaneous dataviz experiments 🖋🖍

Plots are produced with R. I mainly use the `{ggplot2}` package and the packages that revolve around it (`{ggforce}`, `{cowplot}`, `{ggpubr}`, etc.).
